tips: Black Hole systems are said to often be home to rare and valuable salvage.
Daemons can regenerate their armor if left untouched, press the attack and finish them off.
When fighting Legio fleets with Daemons, keeping weaker enemies alive will limit the number of Daemons that can be deployed at once.
Scavengers are known to find unusual ships and weapons out in the fringes, rife for the taking.
